department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Jason Sandri earned his B.A. from Columbia College Chicago, with a concentration in traditional animation.  His work varies over several methods of animation including stop motion, Flash, hand drawn/cell and ink, and pixilation.  His work has been screened at international film festivals on four continents, including Slamdance, Chicago International, Raindance, and Animation Block Party in New York City.
